sentence.Network_cn: 在圣诞节、复活节、圣灵降临节等休几天假.

PerfectNetExp.abs: whitstable 惠特斯特布尔, whitsun 圣神降临周, whitster 漂白剂

entry.tran: 圣灵降临周(复活节后的第七个星期日及接下来的一周)
entry.def: Whitsun is the seventh Sunday after Easter, and the week that follows that Sunday.

means.word_mean: 1. Christian holiday; the week beginning on Whitsunday (especially the first 3 days)

auth_sentence.content: It is also called Whitsun, but does not necessarily coincide with the Whitsun Bank Holiday in the UK.
auth_sentence.res_content: It is also called Whitsun, but does not necessarily coincide with the Whitsun Bank Holiday in the UK.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: It is also called Whitsun, but does not necessarily coincide with the Whitsun Bank Holiday in the UK.

auth_sentence.content: After which the House rises for its Whitsun break - and does not return until Tuesday 7 June.
auth_sentence.res_content: After which the House rises for its Whitsun break - and does not return until Tuesday 7 June.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: After which the House rises for its Whitsun break - and does not return until Tuesday 7 June.

auth_sentence.content: He was known for his collection of poems which included The Less Deceived, The Whitsun Weddings and High Windows.
auth_sentence.res_content: He was known for his collection of poems which included The Less Deceived, The Whitsun Weddings and High Windows.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: He was known for his collection of poems which included The Less Deceived, The Whitsun Weddings and High Windows.
